블러드 포인트는 적게 벌리고, 투자할 곳은 많아서 힘듬. 생존자로 힘들게 모아도 2~3개 40렙 찍으면 랭크가 13~12쯤 됨. 살인마는 더 힘듬. 일퀘 뜨면 퍽 1~2개 들고 해야함...
Good game.

Das Core-Gameplay ist sehr satisfying und äußerst rewarding, auch auf lange Sicht, gerade wenn man als der Killer spielt. Jedoch darf man desswegen nicht den offensichtlichen Fehlern des Spiels aus dem Weg gehen.
Die Entwickler legen einen starken Fokus auf die Survivor-Spielerschaft und lassen somit die Killer-Spieler komplett außen vor. Seit Januar letzten Jahres wurde der mit Abstand wichtigste Killer-Perk um das Highrank-Play erträglich zu machen, dermaßen genurfed das es teilweise wenn man Rang 5 oder Höher ist, als Killer zu spielen einfach nur frustriert. Das Spiel muss sich verändern und kann so nicht bleiben. Jedoch geht für jeden Casual-Horror Fan von meiner Seite eine Empfehlung raus. Wie so oft, ist die Idee fantastisch, aber die Umsetzung lässt zu wünschen übrig
这游戏越玩越带劲～
Ok

I love this game so much that it pains me when the game is put in a bad state, it has so much potential but new releases come with so many game breaking bugs that make the game unbearable and state of the community and way the game is played is truly getting boring.

The game is really overpriced so I'd only recommend buying DLCs if you really enjoy the base game.

The game play is easy to learn, mechanics are nice, and the game features a lot of really cool, popular characters.

Новая обнова 11/10 Сломали все что можно было вообще сломать, а именно:
- Хитбоксы, они и раньше были говном, но теперь считайте что их вообще нет, тебя могут отпиздить даже на 10 метровом расстоянии через куст, стену, палету, окно. Классно не правда ли?
- Сломали даже эмблему, НЕСЛОМЛЕННЫЙ больше не дают если ты не сбежал, хотя блять должны это даже в описании написанно.
- Со слов моего кореша, можно минусануть каплю крови играя в свою игру, проверять не стал, ибо верю на слово.
- Интерфейс, 12/10. Мне понравилось, пока искал сколько генов осталось, сломал шею.
- Уверен что еще много чего было сломанно, но я просто пока не обнаружил этого.
Ну и отдельного внимания заслуживает ситуация с соснольщиками а.к.а. буржуи пидорасы, воины джойстика. Игра в наглую работает на этих унтерменшей, от них не скрыться в данном обновлении, если раньше можно было завернуть 360, то сейчас же ты пососешь бибу и пойдешь плакать в подушку.
Как сказал великий мудрец - "Если не хотите разочароваться в новом обновлении, то просто удалите игру".
Написав этот обзор, я хочу предостеречь людей которые захотят купить данную игру. Ребят оно вам не надо, одумайтесь, купите лучше балтику-9.

Po przegraniu ponad 300h i nowym update niestety gra jest bardzo wadliwa

- perspektywa zabojcy i ocalalego jest zgola inna i ciezko a prawie niemozliwe jest wyczucie momentu aby uzyc swoich umiejetnosci jako ocalaly aby przezyc jeden cios wiecej
- system rang jest totalnie popiepszony i teraz na 10 meczy tracisz "diamencik" mimo ze w statystykach wychodzisz na zero badz nawet plus
- gra jest zalana ruskami z VAC banami ktorzy graja tylko najlepszymi kilerami tj. pielegniarka, zjawa badz kanibalem i bez problemu tuneluja bo przeciez gra za to daje nawet korzysci bedac zabojca (tunelowanie = skupianie sie tylko na konkretnym graczu)
- system rang jest śmieszny bo nawet majac range 1-4 (najwyzsza w grze, najnizsza to 20) to i tak czesto napotkasz tych z najnizsza ranga bo gra wymusza jakikolwiek mecz jesli nie zdazy znalezc graczy na "twoim" poziomie ;)
- wraz z nowym patchem nie ma mozliwosci zrobienia 360 czy innych trikow ktore polegaly na treningu aby cos takiego wykonac - teraz sie modlisz zeby zabojca cie nie trafil przez sciane
- przerobili dwa mapy co chyba mozna uznac tylko za plus

Poza tym jest wiele innych problemow jak zabojcy niszczacy gre ocalalym (tunnel, slug itp) z racji tego że gra nie ma żadnych mechanik karzących za takie zachowanie. Perki w pewnym zestawieniu sa niszczace dla ocalalego badz kilera (zgrani ocalali potrafia doprowadzic zabojce do szału)

Zmiany w tej grze postępuja baaardzo powoli co oznacza że ekipa zajmujaca się dbd to prawdopodobnie kilka osob ktore po prostu nie maja sily przerobowej aby to wszystko zrobic w jakims konkretnym czasie. 
Zglaszajac bugi dostaje sie tylko informacje "błąd jest znany i w trakcie naprawy" - po 2 tyg nadal to samo.

Jakie sa plusy tej gry:
- niski koszt DLC
- zabojcy / ocalali znani z horrorow (piła / silent hill itp)
- swietna rozgrywka ze znajomymi 
- mozliwosc grania customow (1 gra kilerem, pozostala 4 ocalałymi)

Szkoda bo przed patchem gra stała się moją główną rozgrywką, aktualnie trzeba się przesiąść na co innego

This game is so addicting.. As survivor your main goal is to work on generators while the killer tries to hook you and sacrifice you to the entity..You can get hooked 3 times before you are dead for good. The other survivors can try and help you off of the hook. Every survivor has 3 specialized perks that you can work to unlock fully to incorporate with other survivors that you play as. The same goes for the killer. In general, you have 4 perks you can equip and bring into the game that best coincide with one another to give you the best advantage. This is why it is important to level each of the characters up so that you may put together the best setup. The survivors also have items they can bring with them into the trial to help you make it through alive. Some help you save other teammates, work on gens, sabatoge hooks, heal, and more.. 

The killers job is to sacrifice you to the entity. Again they have to hook you 3 times to accomplish their mission. Each killer is built different. For example:throw hatchets, use traps, go invisible, teleport, shoot a harpoon gun..and many more.. They have OG lore characters, as well those from tv and movies. Again the killers have 3 specialized perks as stated above and they also have 4 to bring in with them to the trial to help win the trial. Then they have addons to put onto their specialty to make it better. For example: Traps: addons would be something to make them less visable, stronger hold on survivors etc..

On top of all of that both the survivor and killer can add an offering before the trial begins that can help gain extra BP (Bloodpoints), spawn you farthest from the killer, or all together. A couple of the killer ones make the hooks spawn closer together, and to spawn the survivors seperately. There are TONS of different offerings.

There are totems on the map that survivors can cleanse to gain BP also. Totems start out dull. If a killer has a hex perk equipped, the totem lights up and becomes a Hex totem. Sometimes it is necessary to get rid of the totem instead of working on the generators. You just have to make that choice when you are in the game.

BP(Bloodpoints) are what you gain during each trial for different things that you do such as working on a generator, unhooking and healing teammates, dropping a pallet on a killer as they are chasing you, and more. Killers get BP for breaking doors, gens, and pallets. For hooking and chasing survivors and much more. You use BP to level up your characters within the game to gain new items, level up and get new perks, and getting offerings.

There are also different looks that you can purchase for each killer and survivor. There are charms you can get to where on your belt as a survivor, charms you can add on your hook as a killer to add a little flair. 

One thing I like about DBD is you dont always have to use Auric Cells to purchase things (which is what you purchase with real money to buy certain characters and outfits.) You can use Blood Shards (you get these as you level up within the game) Now some of the characters and outfits will only cost Auric Cells but there is quite a good selection that you can purchase with the Shards. If you play the game a lot and save up your Shards it is fantastic. 

DBD also has a battle pass of sorts called "The Rift" which costs $10 and it comes with outfits and charms that you would not otherwise be able to get outside of the pass. You do challenges from "The Archives" to gain XP and level up, gain BP, and unlock items in your Rift. Note: The Archive challenges can be completed for BP no matter if you have The Rift or not. You just unlock the free items of the Rift rather than the entirety of it.

I am trying to make sure that I cover everything and I'm thinking that I have.. DBD is a game with real players there are never any AI. It is crossplay with Xbox but you can turn it off if you'd rather just stick with what you have. Surviving alone can be tough only because there is NO in game communication. You have to rely on instincts and pay attention to what is going on around you. Survivors only have 2 emotes. Pointing and the "come here" motion. One thing I wish is that they would add more of those. PC players have the ability to type in a chatbox before and after game. I also believe that is another thing they should add for console to be able to communicate also. Even a proximity chat during the trial would be interesting I think. It would definitely add a twist to things. 

Sometimes when running from the killer hitboxes are a bit broken. Say you vault over a pallet or through a window, the killer swings before you jump but sometimes when you are on the other side you will get hit still. Even the killer shouldnt have been able to reach. 

I honestly dont have alot of things to complain about with this game because I truly enjoy it. 

One thing though if you do get this game be prepare because there are a lot of people on this game that are toxic, on both the killer and survivor side. For instance killers will sometimes camp your body while you are on the hook.. If you have a good survivor team this is a situation that you can get out of. Otherwise your kinda screwed. Then you also get the killers that tunnel you which means right after you get unhooked they will go after you again instead of the person that unhooked you. Why they do these things? I have no idea. Then you get toxic survivors that throw pallets for no reason, teabag when you miss hits, when you get pallet stunned, and even when they are at the exit gate about to cross over to finish the game. You also get survivors that carry a flashlight around and will use it when they shouldnt such as clicking it in your face while you are chasing them. Or to get your attention while you are chasing another survivor, then they teabag you because you dont do what they want... So toxicity goes both ways.

There is a report system though. If someone is not playing the game probably, griefing, harrassing, hateful. You can report them and block them. 

With all that said you will also run into great people. There are plenty out there that do funny things within the game, or are funny within the out of game chat (if you are on pc). You can report them as great players also, which is one thing that I like. However, I wish there was some way to be able to check those stats for myself as a survivor or killer to see what people have been saying about me. 

You might get this game and be naturally great at it. Do not get discouraged if you aren't. It takes time to learn the different perks and what goes together. Also to be able to efficiently run from the killer or  "loop" them takes time also. You may get hooked over and over at first. The survivors may escape every time. Eventually though you will find a character you like, you'll level them up and it'll just click. 

If you have read this entire review I thank you and I hope that this gives you the insight that you needed to figure out whether or not you want to purchase this game. Have fun, and good luck next game!

Вот что я могу сказать на счёт новой очень полезной и крутой обновы:
1. после обновы когда мана палетой станишь, независимо от его местоположения, хоть он в другом конце карты, он автоматически телепортируется на твою сторону, откуда ты скинул палетку. и это происходит не только у меня.
Конечно, к багам я привык, особенно к ультра крутым выпадам фредии, но этот баг это что-то с чем-то
2. наверное все видели новый баг с текстурой автобуса, куда могут попасть только сурвы, ну че сказать, бхвр в какой раз конкретно облажались.
3. кто вообще придумал такой интерфейс? я конечно понимаю, что это дело вкуса, но раньше почти все было в одном углу, а теперь всё разбросано по всему экрану, максимально неприятно смотреть на всю эту красоту. но спасибо, что хотя бы добавили масштабирование интерфейса, этого я реально ждал.
4. кому как, но эти анимации намного хуже старых, особенно когда лежачий сурв прыгает в люк, посмотрите как стримеры угарали над этим.

Короче, до обновы все было более или менее удовлетворительно, но сейчас в эту помойку вообще невозможно играть. Но что поделать, вполне нормальной альтернативы дбд нет :(

While this game is fun at its core, it has a lot of issues. Like a real whole lot of issues.

You will probably know what this game is, but I will still very briefly explain it: It's an asymmetrical co-op game with two factions. Four survivors versus one killer.

Problems in the core game play stem from uninteractive elements to the game itself like "tunnelling" and "camping" where horror icons like Michael Myers and Leatherface would rather just down the first survivor they find and try to bully them to death and letting the other three survivors escape. This doesn't happen every game of course, but the inherent game mechancis don't punish you for this.

These inherent unfun game mechanics are one of the reasons that encourage toxic behaviour among the player base. 

These could be fixed, but the developers also call this kind of uninteractive gameplay a valid strategy. This is just the tip of the ice berg of how uncaring the developers are towards their own game. They built a solid foundation... in 2016 but ever since they never really tried to fix its inherent issues after now almost 5 years.

Over the recent months as of this review they have actively disciminated against and admonished colourblind people and have shown disdain and hate towards their playerbase at every opportunity. The company is displaying this behaviour all the while delivering really bad and unpolished updates, introducing game breaking issues, changing elements of the game arbitrarily for the worse (Like the UI) all the while expecting players to never critize any of this but also buy all of their overpriced DLC and cosmetics as if this was a freemium game.

Players get told by the community manager or main balance designer "that they get heard loud and clear" while making snarky remarks in the same sentence.

While this might all seem obscure, overall the company behind this game is atrocious and displays gross mismanagent, to an even bigger degree somehow during this and last year. Even with iconic horror giants in this game I can not recommend it to anyone.

If you are really curious about this game, I would rather recommend watching people play past versions of it it on youtube rather than getting it yourself. That way you won't have to put up with the horrid state the game is in right now.

Since last patch, character movement is very weird and there is other unnecessary changes. If the devs did something about tunneling, slugging, and camping killers, and fix some bugs at least, then I may recommend. But for now game seems to be designed to side with the killer and make u rly upset. It's very surprizing how much devs don't care. Sure I can stop playing this game, but the principal here is to do what is right and fix the game, and bring back players who left. P.S. players, DO NOT keep putting in ur reviews that u r "addicted" to this game and u will play no mater what, bc then u give the devs the upper hand, and a big mess of a game happens.

Survivor isnt fun to play when you go against Death Slinger, Nurse, or spirit (Which is every high rank game). Death slinger can just spam M2 and you dont know when he will shoot, causing him to either catch up to you (If you choose to zig zag), or you continue running straight, where he then just shoots you. 

Nurse makes the base game mechanics completely useless, all you can try to do is juke her out, which barely works against a good one.

Spirit is if you walk she has a "harder time finding you," but any good one will find you anyways by listening for your breathing or grass rustling, and if you are injured you are a goner.

Deady By Daylight proves to be a very unique experience in it's underpopulated category of gaming- one vs many. I would recommend this game to solo players, but especially if you have some friends to play with. This game hits a nerve that I really haven't felt in any other game like it. Has a large amount of content, and pretty in depth systems to delve into. Constant updates and a steady player base. Super solid roster of killers and survivors.

This is probably still one of the most cleverly made multiplayer horror game to this day. The jumpscare juice did NOT run out for me no matter how many times I've played it. I guess the only thing about this game is the loading time to play with randos.
